recommendation: The Commission recommends that the chief executive of KiwiRail closely monitor the replacement of brake blocks on individual wagons to provide another predictive tool for preventing premature wheel-bearing failures.
safety_issue: The high incidence of brake block replacement, which can contribute to premature bearing failure, was not addressed by putting the wagon under an enhanced monitoring and inspection schedule.
